submission:
from collections import defaultdict
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        thrs = defaultdict(int)
        i, j = 0, n - 1
        while j > i:
            if nums[i] <= nums[j]:
                t0 = nums[j] - nums[i]
                t1 = max(nums[j], k - nums[i])
            else:
                t0 = nums[i] - nums[j]
                t1 = max(nums[i], k - nums[j])
            thrs[t0] -= 1
            thrs[t0 + 1] += 1
            thrs[t1 + 1] += 1
            i, j = i + 1, j - 1
        curr, ans = n // 2, n // 2
        for k in sorted(thrs.keys()):
            curr += thrs[k]
            ans = min(ans, curr)
        return ans
